name: Gammel Juice
description:
How do you play this?

WASD to move

Your character shoots at enemies automatically.

Gather enough of their juice to roll a die.

"Normal" die faces increase Damage and / or Projectile Size

Garlic and Axe are new Weapons. Getting these multiple times increases your damage.

The "Bullet + Lightning" increases attack speed up to a cap.

Pink Blob spawns 3 big dudes.

What people have to say

"The lack of sound and music really adds to the atmosphere"

"A little bit better than highlighting icons on your desktop"

"Totally random and unbalanced"

Background

The GMTK Game Jam 2022 was the inspiration to start (and finish) my very first game.

The current version unfortunately does not include everything I wanted to make.

Planned Stuff:

  • Far greater emphasis on dice rolls and multiple dice
  • Usable items
  • Way more enemies

Special Thanks to my discord and IRL friends who gave feedbacks
